title: [Android 6.0 Feature Spotlight] App Info Menu Is Now Just A Tap Away From The Recent App List
text:
[Android 6.0 Feature Spotlight] App Info Menu Is Now Just A Tap Away From The Recent App List 
Published By: AndroidPolice.com - Today 
The app info screen in Android has always been hugely useful, and it's even more so in Android 6.0. You can uninstall an app, see permissio...
